ending.ks.大好きだった祖母は、昨年亡くなってしまった。: Her grandmother, who she loved, she died last year.
ending.ks.「争いの無い世の中にする為、沢山勉強するんだよ」: I will study a lot to make the world free of conflict.
ending.ks.あれこれ言わない祖母だったが、それだけはしつこいほど言われた。: She was a grandmother who didn't say anything about it, but she was persistently told.
ending.ks.「それでは、今日の授業はここまで」: Then, that's all for today's class.
ending.ks.私は教科書を閉じ、家に帰る支度を始めた。: I closed the textbook and started getting ready to go home.
ending.ks.隣の席の友達が声をかけてくる。: A friend in the seat next to me calls out.
